objects.specification: A large rectangular booth floor slab approximately six meters wide and four meters deep with a subtly textured neutral gray surface, finished to emulate a low-profile platform with gently beveled edges and a durable matte coating for traction.
A straight vertical wall panel three meters high and six meters wide, crafted from smooth matte gray composite panels with clean sharp edges, designed to form the back enclosure of the booth.
A mirrored front wall plane three meters tall and six meters wide, finished in matte gray composite, left open at center to form an entrance, with ultra-clean minimalistic styling.
A side wall section four meters deep and three meters tall, constructed with matte gray composite sheeting and seamless vertical joins, forming the left boundary of the booth.
A matching right side wall, four meters deep by three meters tall, featuring flush-mounted panels in matte gray for a uniform and professional enclosure.

A large rectangular company logo sign three meters wide and one meter tall, printed on a glossy acrylic panel with vivid full-color graphics and mounted flush to the back wall above the registration desk.

A sleek registration desk one and a half meters wide and 0.7 meters deep, featuring a warm orange front panel (RGB 255,165,79) with a matte finish, clean minimalist lines, and a concealed storage shelf beneath the countertop.
A cubic display table one meter on each side and one meter tall, finished in a bright blue lacquer (RGB 0,120,215) with square edges and a seamless top surface ideal for showcasing products.
A second identical cubic display table finished in bright blue (RGB 0,120,215), featuring smooth laminated surfaces and crisp right-angle edges for modern appeal.

A tall vertical banner 2 meters high and 0.5 meters wide in vibrant green (RGB 0,200,83), printed on a lightweight fabric with a slight sheen for visual impact, designed to hang flat against the side wall.
A matching vertical banner in vibrant green (RGB 0,200,83), two meters tall by half a meter wide, with crisp graphics on a ceremonial fabric for high visibility.
A round seating table 0.8 meters in diameter and 0.75 meters tall, finished in a soft gray matte surface with gently rounded edges for a welcoming lounge setup.
A second identical round table in soft gray, 0.8-meter diameter and 0.75-meter height, blending seamlessly with adjacent seating for comfortable conversation.
A third soft gray lounge table with rounded edges and a matte finish, delivering a cohesive seating area.
A fourth round seating table in soft gray, matching the other seating tables to create balanced visitor areas.
A modern visitor chair with a curved light-wood frame and light gray upholstered seat and back cushion, featuring slender legs and a minimalist silhouette.
A matching chair with pale wood tones and a soft gray cushion, designed for ergonomic comfort in a compact form.
A contemporary wooden-framed chair with soft gray cushioning, boasting a slightly curved backrest for added support.
A pair-mate chair in light wood and gray upholstery, featuring sleek, slender legs and a minimalist design aesthetic.
A visitor chair with a warm wooden frame and lightly padded gray seat, designed to coordinate with the lounge tables.
A lightweight wooden visitor chair with gray upholstered cushions and gently tapered legs, offering a modern lounge feel.
A matching chair in pale wood and gray fabric, featuring ergonomic contours and a refined minimalist appearance.
A contemporary chair with light wood frame and soft gray upholstery, balancing comfort and sleek visual appeal.
A thin cylindrical pendant light in matte white, 0.2 meters long and 0.05 meters in diameter, emitting a warm white glow, with a minimal hanging cable.
A matching thin matte white LED pendant, providing focused warm illumination with a sleek cylindrical form.
A minimalist white cylindrical light fixture with warm LED output, slender and uniform in design.
A slender white LED cylinder suspended from above, casting a diffuse warm glow for even lighting.
A fifth thin white pendant light, providing balanced ambient light across the booth interior.
A slender hanging string element two meters long with a glossy white finish, designed to suspend clusters of festive balloons from the ceiling.
A matching white glossy string, slender and tensile for reliable balloon suspension.
A slim, glossy white suspension line perfect for creating floating balloon clusters.
A thin decorative line in glossy white, suspended from ceiling corners to hang colorful balloons.
A small glossy balloon sphere 0.2 meters in diameter in vibrant red, with a smooth reflective surface.
A small glossy balloon sphere 0.2 meters across in bright yellow, offering a cheerful accent.
A blue glossy balloon sphere 0.2 meters in diameter, with a bright finish and slight curvature.
A green glossy balloon sphere 0.2 meters wide, adding a fresh pop of color.
A festive red balloon sphere 0.2 meters in diameter with glossy finish for contrast.
A bright yellow spherical balloon 0.2 meters across with a reflective glossy surface.
A 0.2-meter blue balloon sphere in glossy finish, adding vibrant depth to the cluster.
A green glossy balloon sphere 0.2 meters diameter, delivering a playful touch.
A vivid red balloon sphere, diameter 0.2 meters, with a high-gloss finish for maximum color pop.
A sunny yellow glossy balloon sphere 0.2m in diameter, adding brightness to the corner.
A glossy blue balloon sphere 0.2m across with gentle curvature for a lively effect.
A bright green balloon sphere 0.2m in diameter, glossy for a festive accent.
A red glossy 0.2m balloon sphere to complete the colorful array.
A sunny yellow balloon sphere, 0.2m in diameter with a high-gloss surface.
A vivid blue 0.2m balloon sphere with glossy finish for lively decoration.
A fresh green glossy balloon sphere, 0.2 meters in diameter, exhibiting a playful sheen.
